name: Elevator Operator
description:
You play as a bellhop assigned elevator duty in a high-end hotel. Arrange guests in the elevator and deliver them to their desired floors until all guests have reached their destinations, managing placement decisions for the most efficient deliveries!

A puzzle game made for Ludum Dare 42 (Theme: Running Out of Space) in August of 2018 by Evan Charfauros and Heidi Erwin. This was their first Ludum Dare (and first game jam, for that matter). They'd like to thank Denny's for being open 24 hours and for hosting their multi-screen set-up and refilling their waters for 10 hours at a time. 

All art, music, and code is original work.
